summary: Completed frontend testing of NEXUS Pentest LLM application. Core functionality works well including session management, basic chat, and UI navigation. Main issue: Chat persistence between sessions and tool execution dialogs need attention. Overall frontend functionality is 75% working.

ui_bugs.issue: Chat history does not load when switching between sessions - messages disappear
ui_bugs.impact: Users lose conversation history when switching sessions, breaking workflow continuity

ui_bugs.issue: Individual tool clicks (nmap, whois, etc.) do not open parameter input dialogs
ui_bugs.impact: Users cannot configure tool parameters before execution, limiting tool usage flexibility

integration_issues.issue: currentSession state updates visually but chat history fetch may not be working properly
integration_issues.impact: Breaks user expectation of persistent chat sessions

passed_tests: Frontend app loading with all panels (chat, tools, terminal, file explorer)
Session creation via NEW SESSION button
Session switching with visual active state updates
Chat input and message sending functionality
Tool categories expansion (WEB, PASSWORD, EXPLOITATION, WIRELESS, RECON)
Individual tools visibility (Whois, theharvester, Maltago, Nmap, etc.)
File explorer navigation (sandbox structure, folder navigation)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix chat persistence: When users click on different sessions, the fetchChatHistory function should properly load and display the existing messages for that session. Also investigate tool execution dialog opening - individual tool clicks should trigger parameter input modals/dialogs as mentioned in previous fixes.
